description: The image captures a large, glowing spherical installation suspended in a grand room with classical architectural details. The sphere, illuminated in warm yellow and orange hues, dominates the scene, casting a soft light that highlights the ornate ceiling and elegant columns of the room. Below, a few individuals can be seen sitting on the floor, gazing up at the installation in a contemplative manner. The overall atmosphere is serene and awe-inspiring, emphasizing the blend of art and architecture.
poem:
In a grand hall so wide and so tall,
A sphere hangs, not tiny at all.
It glows like the sun,
While people, they shun
The day's bustle, in awe they fall.
